Cognitive Flexibility.description: The ability to switch between different tasks or mental sets.

Working Memory.description: The ability to hold information in mind and manipulate it.

Inhibitory Control.description: The ability to suppress irrelevant information or impulses.

Attentional Control.description: The ability to focus attention on relevant information and ignore distractions.

Cognitive Load.description: The amount of mental effort required to perform a task.

Impulse Control.description: The ability to resist impulsive actions.

Interference Suppression.description: The ability to suppress interfering information from memory.

Selective Attention.description: The ability to focus attention on specific stimuli.

Sustained Attention.description: The ability to maintain attention over time.

Processing Speed.description: The speed at which information is processed.

Emotional Regulation.description: The ability to manage and regulate emotions.

Behavioral Inhibition.description: The ability to inhibit inappropriate behaviors.

Proactive Interference.description: Interference caused by previously learned information.

Retroactive Interference.description: Interference caused by subsequently learned information.

Visual Attention.description: The ability to focus attention on visual stimuli.

Auditory Attention.description: The ability to focus attention on auditory stimuli.

Vigilance.description: The ability to maintain alertness and responsiveness over time.

Concentration.description: The ability to concentrate on a task.

Number of Steps.description: The number of steps involved in a task.

Difficulty of Steps.description: The difficulty of the steps involved in a task.

Reaction Time.description: The time it takes to respond to a stimulus.

Emotional Intelligence.description: The ability to understand and manage emotions.

Visual Search.description: The ability to search for visual information.

Auditory Discrimination.description: The ability to discriminate between auditory stimuli.

Persistence.description: The ability to persist in a task.
